function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on herd immunity as a mitigation strategy for COVID-19","Impact":"Potential disaster if not strictly controlled","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict control measures and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Vaccination technologies","People":"Public, healthcare authorities","Owner":"Healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Challenges in building trust and transparency between public and healthcare authorities","Impact":"Reduced compliance with mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Clear communication, transparency, and trust-building initiatives","Technologies":"Communication technologies, public health campaigns","People":"Public, healthcare authorities","Owner":"Healthcare authorities"}]}
